projects.title: Journal Application
projects.description: An application for creating journal-style notes to store memories using text and images.
features: Design created with the MaterialUI library
Cloud storage using Firebase for information and Cloudinary for images
Sign-in via Google or email
Components tested using Jest
State management using React Redux

projects.title: Gif Expert Application
projects.description: Single-page application serving as an exercise for API usage and simple forms. This application connects to a Giphy API to search for gifs using the form.
features: Design created using Vanilla CSS
Connection to the GIPHY API
Components tested using Jest

projects.title: REST Countries
projects.description: Application that uses a REST API of countries from all over the world, with a screen to view all countries and filter them by name and continent, and a detail screen for each country where detailed information about the selected country can be seen.
features: Design created with the ShadCn library
Added light and dark mode
Connection with the REST Countries API
Use of React Router for managing the two screens

projects.title: Todo List
projects.description: A simple todo list application with registration and login options to keep your personal tasks, and the option to drag and drop tasks to reorder them.
features: Design created with the ShadCn library
Added light and dark mode
Ability to drag and drop tasks to reorder them
Connection with FirebaseDB and FirebaseAuth projects
Use of React Router for managing views, actions, and authentication

projects.title: Multi-step Form
projects.description: Form divided into 5 distinct sections for compartmentalization of questions.
features: Design created with the ShadCn library
Application built with Next.js
Field validation with React Hook Form
Advanced performance and optimization
Use of the newly added Next.js App Directory
